name: The Secrets of Atlantis: The Sacred Legacy
name_original: The Secrets of Atlantis: The Sacred Legacy
description:
The Secrets of Atlantis: The Sacred Legacy is an adventure-puzzle game developed by Atlantis Interactive Entertainment. It was originally released in 2006. It was published by Nobilis. Most rawgers rated the game as "Recommended".
You can play The Secrets of Atlantis: The Sacred Legacy on PC.
